author: bridge-bot
content:
<adietrichs> As discussed, the breakout call this week will be on L2 fee markets! this one will be a bit more experimental, as this is more of a research topic - we will have to see to what extent a breakout call is a good format for making progress on this.

You can find the announcement & agenda here: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/rollcall-breakout-2-fee-markets/18381

As usual, zoom link will be shared here shortly before the call. Looking forward to seeing (some of) you on the call!

author: bridge-bot
content: <adietrichs> also, given that this is more of a specialized topic, there might be less of an overlap of usual rollcall attendees and people within your teams thinking about fee markets. so in case you have such people that might not be in this group, it would be great if you could forward the invite ðŸ™‚
